price: Man says, “Once I am dead, will I be raised to life again?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
